DE.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
DE.description: Erlebe das originale Abenteuer von Ryu Hayabusa, dem Schattenkämpfer, in diesem gefeierten Actionspiel aus der NES-Ära! In Ninja Gaiden reist Ryu nach Amerika, um die Ermordung seines Vaters zu rächen, und deckt dabei eine Verschwörung auf, welche die Welt bedroht. Die Hintergrundgeschichte wird anhand von einzigartigen Zwischensequenzen im Anime-Stil erzählt. Renne, krieche, springe und klettere, während du dir einen Weg durch zwanzig herausfordernde seitlich scrollende Abschnitte bahnst, die sich auf sechs Level verteilen! Besiege Schlägerbanden, böse Ninja und barbarische Endgegner mit deinem messerscharfen Drachenschwert und dem Einsatz von Ninjutsu – Ninja-Magie!

BG.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
BG.description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed action-platformer from the NES era. Ninja Gaiden sees Ryu travel to America to seek vengeance for his father’s murder and uncover a plot that threatens the world – as told through unique anime-style cutscenes. Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

BE.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
BE.description: Prenez part à la première aventure de Ryu Hayabusa, le ninja de l'ombre, dans ce jeu datant de l'ère NES qui mêle action et plateformes. Avec des cinématiques d'exception de style manga, Ninja Gaiden retrace le périple de Ryu parti en Amérique pour venger la mort de son père et déjouer un complot menaçant la Terre entière. Parcourez six chapitres excitants à travers vingt niveaux à défilement horizontal et terrassez gangs de malfrats, dangereux ninjas et boss retors ! Courez, sautez, rampez, escaladez, et apprenez à manier le Sabre Dragon et le Ninpo comme personne !

EE.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
EE.description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed action-platformer from the NES era. Ninja Gaiden sees Ryu travel to America to seek vengeance for his father’s murder and uncover a plot that threatens the world – as told through unique anime-style cutscenes. Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

ES.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
ES.description: ¡Vive la original aventura de Ryu Hayabusa, el guerrero de las sombras, en este aclamado juego de acción y plataformas de la era NES! En Ninja Gaiden, la sed de venganza por el asesinato de su padre lleva a Ryu a Estados Unidos, donde saca a la luz un complot que amenaza el mundo; todo esto narrado a través de vídeos estilo anime únicos. ¡Corre, agáchate, salta y trepa a través de 20 desafiantes áreas de desplazamiento horizontal en seis niveles mientras combates bandas de matones, malvados ninjas y feroces jefes con tu mortífera Espada del Dragón y el Ninpo, la magia ninja!

Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

NL.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
NL.description: Ervaar het originele avontuur van Ryu Hayabusa, de schaduwkrijger, in dit beroemde actie-platformspel uit het NES-tijdperk. In Ninja Gaiden reist Ryu naar Amerika om wraak te nemen op de moordenaar van zijn vader, en hij stuit op een plan dat de wereld bedreigt. Dit alles wordt verteld met unieke tekenfilmpjes in anime-stijl. Ren, kruip, spring en klim door 20 uitdagende zijwaartsscrollende gebieden, verdeeld over zes levels, en versla straatbendes, kwaardaardige ninja's en barbaarse bazen met je dodelijke Dragon Sword en Ninpo – de gevreesde ninja- magie.

SE.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
SE.description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed action-platformer from the NES era. Ninja Gaiden sees Ryu travel to America to seek vengeance for his father’s murder and uncover a plot that threatens the world – as told through unique anime-style cutscenes. Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

PT.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
PT.description: Vive a aventura original de Ryu Hayabusa, o guerreiro sombra, neste jogo de ação e plataformas aclamado da era NES. Em Ninja Gaiden, Ryu viaja até à América em busca de vingança pela morte do seu pai e depara-se com um plano que ameaça o mundo - como narrado no estilo anime único de sequências cinemáticas. Corre, agacha-te, salta e trepa à medida que batalhas por entre 20 áreas desafiantes de deslocação lateral ao longo de seis níveis, derrotando gangues de bandidos, ninjas maléficos e vilões bárbaros com as tuas mortíferas Dragon Sword e Ninpo - magia ninja.

SI.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
SI.description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed action-platformer from the NES era. Ninja Gaiden sees Ryu travel to America to seek vengeance for his father’s murder and uncover a plot that threatens the world – as told through unique anime-style cutscenes. Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

HU.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
HU.description: Experience the original adventure of Ryu Hayabusa, the shadow warrior, in this acclaimed action-platformer from the NES era. Ninja Gaiden sees Ryu travel to America to seek vengeance for his father’s murder and uncover a plot that threatens the world – as told through unique anime-style cutscenes. Run, crouch, jump and climb as you battle through 20 challenging side-scrolling areas over six acts while defeating gangs of thugs, evil ninjas and barbarian bosses with your deadly Dragon Sword and Ninpo – ninja magic.

IT.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
IT.description: Vivi un'avventura nei panni del guerriero ninja Ryu Hayabusa e cimentati in questo celebre gioco di piattaforme e azione dell'era NES. Parti alla volta degli Stati Uniti per vendicare la morte di tuo padre e sconfiggere le forze del male, come narrato negli intermezzi in stile anime. Corri, accovacciati, salta e arrampicati facendoti strada lungo sei difficili livelli a scorrimento orizzontale, sconfiggendo le bande di criminali, i ninja malvagi e i boss spietati presenti nelle 20 aree del gioco. A tua disposizione avrai la mortale Lama del Drago e il Ninpo, la misteriosa magia dei ninja.

FR.name: NINJA GAIDEN®
FR.description: Prenez part à la première aventure de Ryu Hayabusa, le ninja de l'ombre, dans ce jeu datant de l'ère NES qui mêle action et plateformes.
